hero.title: VaoCa — Lean HR solution for SMEs
hero.subtitle: From time clocks to employees' phones, all attendance data syncs to VaoCa. Manage HR faster, more efficiently, and smarter — all in one app.
how.title: How it works — Who is it for?
how.for_managers.title: For Managers
how.for_managers.desc: Create shifts, assign staff, approve leave requests and track reports on mobile or web.
how.for_staff.title: For Staff
how.for_staff.desc: Clock in with phone, view schedules and submit leave requests easily.
